summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ChitraKalakar artisan marketplace. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend user flows working correctly including registration, authentication, dashboard functionality, and custom order creation. Minor UI interaction issues with modal overlays but core functionality intact.

resolved_issues.issue: Syntax errors in server.py with escaped quotes
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Fixed all escaped quotes and literal newline characters

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepts clicks after form submission
ui_bugs.workaround: User can close dialog manually or click outside

resolved_issues.issue: Gallery icon import error from lucide-react
